title: Judge temporarily blocks Trump administration from deploying troops in Portland, Oregon
byline: A federal judge in Oregon temporarily blocked President Donald Trump’s administration from deploying the National Guard in Portland, ruling Saturday in a lawsuit brought by the state and city.

title: Heavy showers above 75 mm expected in some areas today
byline: Atmospheric conditions are favorable for thunderstorms in the evening. Therefore, general public is advised to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by heavy rain, strong winds and strong lightning during thundershowers, today (05), the Department of Meteorology said.

title: Shooting incident reported in Elpitiya
byline: An unidentified individual, who arrived on a motorcycle has opened fire at a residence in Omaththa, Elpitiya, last night (04), police stated.

title: Netanyahu says he hopes to announce hostage release in the ‘coming days’
byline: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has said he hopes to announce the release of hostages being held in Gaza “in the coming days”.

title: Three dead, 3 injured in lorry-bus collision at Narammala
byline: At least three individuals have died and three others have sustained injuries following a collision involving a lorry and a bus near Narammala town on the Narammala-Kurunegala main road, police stated.

title: Suspect wanted over shooting and attempted murder arrested in Maradana
byline: A suspect wanted by the police in connection with an attempted murder by shooting in Panchikawatta area of Maradana, has been arrested by officers of the Colombo North Divisional Crime Investigation Bureau.

title: Typhoon Matmo strengthens, prompting China to evacuate 150,000 people ahead of landfall
byline: Typhoon Matmo strengthened ahead of making landfall on Sunday (Oct 5) in China, prompting the government to evacuate 150,000 people from southern Guangdong province.

title: Ex-President Mahinda calls people’s affection a ‘heartfelt bond beyond politics’
byline: Former President Mahinda Rajapaksa has declared that the love and support of the people as a bond rooted in trust and mutual respect, free from any profit motives.

title: Trump authorises deployment of 300 National Guard troops to Chicago
byline: President Donald Trump has authorised the deployment of 300 National Guard troops to Chicago to address what he says is out-of-control crime.

title: 731 to receive permanent Postal Assistant appointments
byline: A total of 731 individuals have been selected for appointment to the post of Postal Assistant Grade III under the Primary Non-Skilled Service Category of the Department of Posts.

title: Passenger arrested at BIA while attempting to smuggle foreign cigarettes worth over Rs. 4.5 mln
byline: A Sri Lankan passenger has been arrested at the Bandaranaike International Airport (BIA) by officers of the Police Narcotics Bureau (PNB) while attempting to smuggle a consignment of foreign-manufactured cigarettes worth Rs. 4.5 million into the country.
